name: Puppy Dog Fingers! with Augmented Reality FREE
name_original: Puppy Dog Fingers! with Augmented Reality FREE
description:
From the makers of the crazy popular Fish Fingers, Shark Fingers, Kitten Fingers, Dolphin Fingers, Zombie Fingers and many more! Try them all!

Puppy Dog Fingers! gives you a pack of cute cartoon puppies to play with, right in your pocket!! But better yet, it puts them all around you, all the time!!

Using innovative Augmented Reality like you've never seen before, Puppy Dog Fingers puts dogs all around you, in the real world! YOU HAVE TO SEE IT TO BELIEVE IT! Hold your phone like you're taking a picture and look around, puppies are everywhere!!

Hold your finger on the screen to attract them! Hear them woof! See them play! Take photos of them in your world and send them straight to FaceBook!

Or, you can select any picture for your puppies to run and play on, leaving footprints as they go! They'll follow your finger! Use any image you like, freak out your friends by fooling them into thinking your phone screen has been taken over by puppies!

(Augmented reality mode requires iPhone4/4S/5, iPod 4th Gen or higher, iPad2 or higher. All other devices will still be able to use Puppy Dog Fingers to have puppies run and play on your own images!)
